libraryStrings.selectVideo: Etkileşimleri eklemeden önce bir video seçmelisin.
libraryStrings.removeInteraction: Bu etkileşimi kaldırmak istediğinizden emin misiniz?
libraryStrings.bookmarkAlreadyExists: Bu noktada yer imi zaten var. Oynatma çubuğunun yerini değiştirin ve başka bir zamanda bir yer imi veya gönderi ekranı ekleyin.
libraryStrings.tourStepUploadIntroText:
Bu tur size Etkileşimli Video editörünün en özellikklerin tanıtacaktır.

Bu turu herhangi bir zamanda sağ üst köşedeki Tur butonuna tıklayıp başlatın.

Bu turu geçmek için KAPAT veya devam etmek için SONRAKİ butonuna basınız.
libraryStrings.tourStepUploadFileText:
Start by adding a video file. You can upload a file from your computer or paste a URL to a YouTube video or a supported video file.

To ensure compatibility across browsers, you can upload multiple file formats of the same video, such as mp4 and webm.
libraryStrings.tourStepUploadAddInteractionsText:
Once you have added a video, you can start adding interactions.

Press the Add interactions tab to get started.
libraryStrings.tourStepCanvasToolbarText: To add an interaction, drag an element from the toolbar and drop it onto the video.
libraryStrings.tourStepCanvasEditingText:
Once an interaction has been added, you can drag to reposition it.

To resize an interaction, press on the handles and drag.

When you select an interaction, a context menu will appear. To edit the content of the interaction, press the Edit button in the context menu. You can remove an interaction by pressing the Remove button on the context menu.
libraryStrings.tourStepCanvasBookmarksText: You can add Bookmarks from the Bookmarks menu. Press the Bookmark button to open the menu.
libraryStrings.tourStepCanvasEndscreensText: You can add submit screens from the submit screens menu. Press the submit screen button to open the menu.
libraryStrings.tourStepCanvasPreviewText: Press the Play button to preview your interactive video while editing.
libraryStrings.tourStepCanvasSaveText: When you're done adding interactions to your video, press Save/Create to view the result.
libraryStrings.tourStepSummaryText: This optional Summary quiz will appear at the end of the video.
libraryStrings.fullScoreRequiredPause: "Full score required" option requires that "Pause" is enabled.
libraryStrings.fullScoreRequiredRetry: "Full score required" option requires that "Retry" is enabled
libraryStrings.fullScoreRequiredTimeFrame:
There already exists an interaction that requires full score at the same interval as this interaction.
Only one of the interactions will be required to answer.
libraryStrings.endscreenAlreadyExists: Submit screen already exists here. Move playhead and add a submit screen or a bookmark at another time.
libraryStrings.tooltipBookmarks: Click to add bookmark at the current point in the video
libraryStrings.tooltipEndscreens: Click to add submit screen at the current point in the video
